title: New worlds for old
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Maslyn Williams
brief_description: A survey of the progress being made in Papua and New Guinea, showing new industries, new roads and means of transport, the introduction of sheep, cattle and goats, and the way in which the natives are being encouraged to cooperate in these activities.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Maslyn Williams
